roleset.name: interpret morality

example.name: All args
example.text: The President moralized to the reporters about government spending and government debt problem.
example.arg: about government spending and government debt problem.

example.name: nominal rel: moralizing
example.text: Instead , pigs , sheep , and dogs all just become delicious meals on the plates of those people who are full of moralizing in front of the bears .

roleset.name: righteous, good

example.text: The Federalists did not attack the constitutionality of Madison's wartime powers but his specific claim that the war was moral and just.
